title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Immersive Virtual Reality for Developing Industrial Systems Mental Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and industrial system design principles
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interactive relationships of cooling system components in an IVR environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can construct virtual systems applying design principles of industrial systems using SDVR tools.
Learners can systematically diagram causal relationships between internal system processes through project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
